panelInformations.title: 素材とお手入れ方法、修理
panelInformations.description:
• Do not wash
  • Do not bleach
  • Do not tumble dry
  • Iron at a maximum sole-plate temperature of 110°C
  • Mild professional dry cleaning in hydrocarbons KWL
  • Gentle dry clean
  • Protect the accessories before cleaning
  • Iron inside out with a fabric in between
panelInformations.introduction: To preserve the quality of this garment, we recommend you to respect the care instructions :

category.name: メンズ アウター＆コート

name: シングルブレステッドリバーシブルテクニカルコットンコート
